content: this pattern was once only available in donna kooler s crocheted afghan book the rights have reverted back to me and i am now offering it for free on my blog this throw works two row on the same side before turning which enables you to change colors every row without cutting the woven appearance comes from using a double crocheted mesh followed by a row of treble_crochet alternately worked in front and behind the previous row spaces finished size 42 x 55 materials yarn original afghan designed with aunt lydias denim worsted weight 75% cotton/25% acrylic o color a white 1600 yds o color b linen 1200 yds size g crochet hook safety pin or stitch holder yarn needle gauge chain 22 = 5 inches first 9 row = 3 inches basic stitches and terms used chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet skip = skip double_crochet = double_crochet lp = loop treble_crochet = treble_crochet
